deploy:apex.description: Deploy apex class using tooling api

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

deploy:staticresource.description: Deploy static resource using tooling api
examples: $ sfdx deploy:staticresource -p <filepath> --cachecontrol public --resourcefolder <name of the folder where you have single page app>

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

filepath.name: filepath
filepath.description: file path of the resource bundle

resourcefolder.name: resourcefolder
resourcefolder.description: name of the folder where you have single page app, This defaults to staticresources

metadatatype.name: metadatatype
metadatatype.description: type of the metadata. Examples are CustomObject, Profile

oldfullname.name: oldfullname

retrieve:dxsource.description: Retrieves Source is DX format from Unmanaged/Managed package

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

packagename.name: packagename
packagename.description: the name of the package you want to retrieve

pathname.name: pathname
pathname.description: where to convert the result to.defaults to force-app

retainmetadata.name: retainmetadata
retainmetadata.description: If set retain the metadata folder in mdapiout directory and do not clean

retrieve:pkgsource.description: Retrieves Source from Unmanaged/Managed package in Metadata API format
examples: $ sfdx retrieve:pkgsource -n <package/changeset> -r <relative path where source is retrieved and unzipped>

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

packagename.name: packagename
packagename.description: the name of the package you want to retrieve
